Title: Ghost Town
Plot: The son of a notorious killer is arrested on suspicion of murder, and the CSI team must overcome their natural prejudices against the boy's antecedents in order to track the true culprit.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Jorja Fox, Cheryl White, Brian Howe, Devon Graye, Stella Maeve, Marc Vann, Larry Sullivan
